questions.a: Our AI algorithms analyze your uploaded contract documents and identify potential risks. The system is trained on thousands of contracts and legal documents.

questions.q: What types of contracts can you analyze?
questions.a: We currently analyze rental, freelance, and sales contracts. More contract types will be added soon.
Yes, all your contracts are encrypted and deleted from our system within 24 hours after analysis. No data is manually accessed.
No, ClauseGuard is not a legal advice tool. We still recommend consulting a lawyer for important contracts.
We offer a full refund if you're not satisfied within 7 days of purchasing a one-time or monthly plan.
We currently have a 30-page limit for PDF files. For larger files, please contact us.
